CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C01

TI_TEXT.P: Τέφρα και υπολείμματα που περιέχουν μέταλλα
Cenizas y residuos que contengan metales
Cendres et résidus contenant des métaux
Pepeo i ostaci, koji sadrže kovine
Pelenai ir liekanos, kurių sudėtyje yra metalų
Irmied u residwi li jkun fihom il-metalli
Cenuşă şi resturi cu conţinut de metale
Popol a zvyšky s obsahom kovov
Pepel in ostanki, ki vsebujejo kovine

TITLE.P: Request for information / Incinerator bottom ash treatment and aggregate utilization service, Ekomo Ämmässuo eco-industrial centre, Espoo

SHORT_DESCR.P: This document is not a procurement announcement, not a request for quotation, not an invitation to negotiation, nor will its publication start a tender competition. This document serves as a Request for Information (RFI) on existing and upcoming services for processing and utilization of municipal Incinerator Bottom Ash (IBA). The purpose of this RFI is to clarify the criteria for the upcoming Request for Quotation (RFQ) and to determine the best procurement procedures. Procurement of the service will take place in fall of 2018 and the service is to commence in spring of 2019. This RFI does not bind the contracting entity to make any procurement based on this request. Participation in this RFI does not in any way bind any party in a potential future RFQ. Suppliers who refrain from participating in this RFI are equally allowed to participate in a potential future RFQ.

This request for information is to find the best overall service solution where the service provider processes the IBA and finds suitable utilization solutions for the remaining processed aggregate. Service provider will acquire the non-ferrous metals separated from the IBA. Ferrous metals will remain as the property of the procurer. The solution for IBA aggregate utilization may still be in development, but the solution should actualize within 2 years of the procurement.

INFO_ADD.P: Helsinki Region Environmental Services Authority (HSY) together with Rosk’n Roll Oy Ab (RR) are responsible for the processing and utilization of municipal incinerator bottom ash (IBA) formed at Vantaa Energy waste-to-energy power plant. Approximately 72 000 tons of municipal incinerator bottom ash is formed yearly and it is stored at Ämmässuo eco-industrial center at Espoo. Ferrous and non-ferrous metals are to be removed from the IBA for reuse purposes. Around 65 000 tons of processed IBA aggregate remains after separation of metals. HSY and RR will organize an event on 25.4.2018 to answer any questions needed for completing the inquiry. Answering to the request for information is desirable, even if participation in the abovementioned event is not possible. HSY and RR withhold the right to invite or not to invite suppliers for further technical dialogue. HSY and RR will not pay for any work related to this request for information or to the potential technical dialogue. Further dialogue with service providers is intended to be held in May and/or August 2018. The information provided in the technical dialogue is not public and will not be distributed to any other party. We kindly ask the suppliers to mark their technical information as “business confidential”, if such material is included. Results of the possible technical dialogue will determine whether an innovation partnership procurement procedure following EU directive would be feasible as a procurement procedure in case of Municipal Incinerator Bottom Ash treatment and aggregate utilization service. HSY and RR will organize on 25.4.2018 an event for service suppliers in the Helsinki metropolitan area. The event is held to provide service suppliers help in filling the request for information and to provide possibilities to confidentially exchange information with HSY experts before sending the request for information. Registering for the event is done by sending an email to riku.sinervo@hsy.fi the latest by 18.4.2018. HSY kindly requests possible service providers to send the following reports the latest 11.5.2018:
— reports on Incinerator bottom ash treatment and processed IBA aggregate utilization service,
— reports on the service economic model,

— reports on the available resources available for fulfilment of the service starting 2019 Above reports are to be sent with the subject “Incinerator bottom ash treatment and aggregate utilization service” by email to renja.rautiainen@hsy.fi
At its discretion, HSY calls service suppliers whom have supplied the abovementioned reports for further technical dialogue.
